org.overture.ast.node

Interface IToken

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TAsync, Token, TStatic

    public interface IToken
extends INode
    Token is the superclass of all tokens is the AST.

      • removeChild

        void removeChild(INode child)
        Implements the Node.removeChild(INode) method. Since tokens have no children, it always throws a RuntimeException.
        Specified by:
        removeChild in interface INode
        Parameters:
        child - the child node to be removed from this IToken node
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if child is not a child of this IToken node
